at the beginning of your upkeep put a minus n minus n counter on enchanted creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller put a minus n minus n counter on that creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller remove a sleep counter from that creature
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player loses n life
put a minus n minus n counter on target creature
put a plus n plus n counter on target creature
put a minus n minus n counter on each attacking creature
